summary: REQ-19/20/21 appear to be implemented via a new aurora-style background component applied at the page level, new gradient/label text utilities and usage in the portfolio page, and a clearly documented/exported profile photo path constant matching the required asset path. The diff also introduces unrequested navigation behavior (scroll spy + active link styling) and custom smooth-scroll handling.

hallucinated_features.description: Scroll-spy behavior that tracks the active section on scroll and changes nav link styling based on active section.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on background styling, decorated text accents, and documenting the profile photo path; it does not request adding active-section tracking or modifying navigation behavior beyond existing composition.

hallucinated_features.description: Custom smooth scrolling implementation using window.scrollTo({ behavior: 'smooth' }) with an offset calculation.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-19/20/21; this changes interaction behavior rather than background/text/path documentation.
